auth.email_confirmation: Please check your email to confirm your account
auth.signed_in: Welcome back! You've been signed in successfully
auth.invalid_credentials: The email or password you entered is incorrect.
auth.verification_email_missing: Enter your email to resend the verification link.
auth.verification_email_resent: Verification email re-sent. Please check your inbox.
auth.reset_email_sent: Password reset link sent! Please check your inbox.
auth.reset_email_error: We couldn't send the reset email. Please try again.
auth.reset_email_missing: Enter your email address to receive a reset link.
auth.password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
auth.password_updated: Your password has been updated successfully.
auth.password_update_error: We couldn't update your password. Please try again.
auth.password_change_preheader: If this wasn't you, secure your account immediately.
auth.password_change_body: We just updated the password for your Lumiso account.
auth.password_change_support: If you didn't make this change, reset your password again or contact support right away.
auth.password_recovery_preheader: Use this secure link to create a new password.
auth.password_recovery_body: We received a request to reset your Lumiso password. Click the button below to continue.
auth.password_recovery_warning: This link expires in 60 minutes. If you didn't request a reset, you can safely ignore this email.
auth.signup_confirmation_preheader: Verify your address to activate your workspace.
auth.signup_confirmation_body: Click the button below to activate your account and start collaborating.
auth.signup_confirmation_warning: If you didn't sign up for Lumiso, you can ignore this email.
auth.recovery_link_invalid: This recovery link is invalid or has expired. Request a new email to continue.
